content.rendered:
During the NFR 2023, several after-parties will be held at various venues around Las Vegas. Here is the full schedule:

Virgin Hotels Las Vegas Official Wrangler NFR Viewing Party

This event will take place from December 1 to 10, opening at 4 p.m. The event will feature the RMEF Calcutta at 5:00 p.m., the NFR Live Feed at 5:45 p.m., and free live concerts. Admission is free and open to the public, with paid table/bottle service available.

NFR After Dark at Westgate Las Vegas

This event will take place from December 1 to 10, opening at 4 p.m. with free entertainment in iBar. The event will feature live entertainment, including free concerts nightly. Admission is free and open to the public.

Buckin’ Bash After Party

This event will be held nightly at 9 p.m. from December 1 to 10 at The Orleans Hotel & Casino — Bourbon Street Lounge. The event will feature live music, dancing, special guests, and giveaways. Admission is free and open to the public for those 21 and up.

Cinch Western Kickoff Party

This event will be held on November 30 from 10 p.m. to midnight at the South Point Showroom. The event will feature a concert by an artist to be determined. Admission is free and open to the public.

Wrangler NFR Nightly Viewing & After Party at Silverton Casino Lodge

This event will take place from December 7 to 16. Doors open for the viewing party at 5 p.m., and live entertainment starts at 8:30 p.m. The event will feature prizes, giveaways, food and drink specials.

Gold Buckle Zone at MGM Grand

This event will take place from December 7 to 16. The event will feature live music, dancing, free viewing parties, and giveaways nightly.

Golam Muktadir
@graph.description: Golam Muktadir is a passionate sports fan and a dedicated movie buff. He has been writing about both topics for over a decade and has a wealth of knowledge and experience to share with his readers. Muktadir has a degree in journalism and has written for several well-known publications, including Surprise Sports.
